author: Football Italia Staff
description: Verona have joined Spal in Serie A next season, while Frosinone were unable to avoid the promotion play-offs after a dramatic final round.
title: Serie B: Verona promoted into Serie A

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Genoa have mathematically secured their Serie A safety with a 2-1 victory over Torino thanks to Luca Rigoni and Giovanni Simeone.
title: Genoa secure Serie A safety

author: Football Italia Staff
description: The schedule for the final round of the Serie A season has been announced, with Roma-Genoa and Sampdoria-Napoli early on Sunday.
title: Final Serie A round schedule

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Sime Vrsaljko could be coming back to Serie A after his Atletico Madrid spell, as Milan, Inter and Napoli are interested.
title: Serie A sides call Vrsaljko back

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Sime Vrsaljko could be coming back to Serie A after his Atletico Madrid spell, as Milan, Inter and Napoli are interested.
title: Serie A sides call Vrsaljko back

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte claims Serie A “is certainly the most difficult League in the world” and “the secret to the success of Italian Coaches”.
title: Conte: Serie A most difficult

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte claims Serie A “is certainly the most difficult League in the world” and “the secret to the success of Italian Coaches”.
title: Conte: Serie A most difficult

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Join us for all the build-up and action as it happens from today’s Serie A games, as Roma visit Chievo to keep the Scudetto race alive and Napoli host Fiorentina.
title: Liveblog: Serie A Super Saturday
